author: Staff Reporter
text:
Four persons, including two women, suffered injuries after water mixed with turmeric and chemicals were splashed on them during temple festival at Reddipudur in Puduchatram here on Friday.

The temple festival is being held for the past two days.

On the third day, as part of rituals, water mixed with turmeric powder is splashed against each other. However, it is said that some persons mixed chemicals and sprayed on two persons, Ravikumar and Veeramani, who suffered injuries. Water was also splashed on Thangamal and Vasantha. They were admitted to Government District Headquarters Hospital.

In another incident, three children suffered minor injuries after burst crackers hit them during temple festival at Mallamupanpatty in Suramangalam, Salem. They were witnessing the festival when the crackers hit them.
title: Four hurt during temple festival
